Html:
Ok, so I know I'm a newbie but my app is working perfectly (displaying a map and moving the map center based on lat/lon coming from a flight simulator)

BUT!

I'm unable to use GMapOverlay as it keeps telling me its not found in the namespace and asking whether I've missed a reference :(

I have :
using GMap.NET;
using GMap.NET.MapProviders;
using GMap.NET.WindowsForms.Markers;

I even tried forcing by using GMap.NET.WindowsForms.GMapOverlay, but no beans :(
Heres a snapshot and it can't even see it in the autocomplete....



If I comment out anything to do with overlays, then its all fine !
I'm using the latest hot release.

TIA
Si
Thanks. And that goes where exactly ? (currently reading up on explicitly adding additional namespaces.....)

DOH! Don't worry, figured it out :-) Thanks for the pointers....

Annoyed at how simple it was :-( Just needed a new set of eyes.
